content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting outside of our home in los angeles near the la river. i noticed a very bright yellow-orange light approaching rapidly from the se. i am a space and aircraft enthusiast and it seemed strange that this object was flying so quickly in a direction never used by any of the aircraft that fly over our area. it also did not look like the helicopters that are a ubiquitous part of living in l.A.
 i listened for the sound of an engine as it approached and heard nothing at all. there was nothing else in the sky at that time. there were minimal hazy patches of clouds but the few stars visible in los angeles were easy to see. the object then slowed as it came nearly overhead. at that time i asked my wife to have a look and she didn't have an explanation for it either. we watched as it came to a stop, slowly moved to the right (our left) and very slowly turned in a parabola towards the sw. it then completely disappeared. the color was yellow-orange and was constant. no flashing lights and certainly no sound. i have no idea what it's altitude was. we are neither of us given to this type of speculation. nor are we ufo enthusiasts in any way. i know from my experience with various aircraft that the only things that move like this did are helicopters but the speed at which it approached and the silence from it makes me think it was not a helicopter. neither of us drink or use drugs, neither of us are prone to hallucinations. there was nothing in the news today at all about it and i have not found any statements online from either witnesses or authorities. what did we see?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object approached my location from se rapidly, then slowed, stopped, moved to my left, and turned back toward sw. then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to my front porch last night, sept. 27, 2011, about 10:30pm. i was admiring the stars when i noticed one very bright in the northwestern sky. the more i looked at it i realized it was 'twinkling' but with all colors of the rainbow. i got my camera and took over 40 pictures of it. i could see it clearly when my camera would focus, but most of the pics came out like a colored scribble. it was so far away and i didn't have a tripod. i tried to take video, but my camera wouldn't focus on it. i watched and took pics for about 15 min then it got lighter and smaller and was gone. once i thought it was going to disappear, but then got brighter again and stayed a bit longer.
tonight, sept. 28, 2011, i tried again to see it. at about 9:30pm it was there again. further south and about the same height in the sky. i made a make-shift tripod and got much better pics! i tried again to take some video. not sure that turned out, but the pics are awesome! i went back out to see if it was still there at about 10:30, but it was completely gone.
content.summary: Star-like. ring with attached appendages. rainbow of lights along rim.

content.detailedDescription:
Date 9-11-2011 time aprox. 9:00 pm place erwin park 
full moon that night. i was flying my rc airplane. i have blue and red leds outlining the plane so i can fly it in the dark. the plane was getting a little too far away for me to see in the dark so i brought it back closer. i was flying it almost straight up above my head . at the time i was following it from the west side of me to the east side of me. as i was watching the plane i saw a blue oblong star-like object going the same direction as my plane. it was traveling quite fast. it was about a magnitude three in brilliance. it fluctuated in brilliance. kind of shimmering. i landed the plane as quickly as i could, this took only a few seconds. when i looked up to find the blue light i could no longer see it. just guessing at about passenger jet high or higher. sighting approximately seven seconds. i've never seen a blue object traveling through the sky before.
content.summary: Oblong blue shimmering starlike, high and quick

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking for this light that shows up out of nowhere, when my husband noticed a light in the eastern sky the looked to be spinniing with red,blue,yellow and white lights that didn't blink on and off, but rotated in a circle around like a spinning top.  shortly after trying to get the lights on camera we saw what we first thought was a helicopter with a search light going in the direction of the lights.  so we ran into the garage so the search light would not see us. when we looked up about 10 seconds later the lights went out as the plane got closer. the plane turned off the search light and headed east. when it got out of sight the bright spinning lights came back but not in the same spot.  i don't know of any plane with a search light but i know it was not a helicopter and we heard a engine but we didn't see or hear helicopter blades. i just want to know anyone else saw this or notices the lights. they show up often and no it's not a star. i study stars!!!!!!!!!!!!! do not currently have upload cable, but i am willing to show videos.
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Object spins and hovers with bright colors. moves very, very slowly and dims in and out with colors visible with the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside in tucson with my mother when, while glancing up at the sky, i noticed three bright green orb-like objects flying slowly in a triangle formation. at first i thought it was paper lanterns or an airplane, but upon further inspection they were way too perfectly spherical to be lanterns, and too big to be plane lights. they hovered slowly in a northward path for about 15 minutes, before stopping briefly and shooting up into the air, their light disintegrating as they shot up. when my mom and i first saw the objects, she had grabbed my arm and told me that she felt her stomach drop, and felt very uneasy. for about 10 minutes after the sighting, i had a dull headache near the back of my skull and my eyes felt dry and ached.
content.summary: Triangle formation of three bright green orbs floating slowly towards the north of tortolita mountain then shooting up and disappearing

content.detailedDescription: August 31 2011 at approx 2115 hrs i was driving home from work, just started going down a hill when i noticed a light in the sky heading towards me west to east. initially thought it was an aircraft as i got to the bottom of hill and object got closer i noticed an odd color to it i pulled my vehicle over into local tennis club parking lot to watch it. it continued to head towards me and at it's nearest point to me approx eigth mile or less it gradually changed course to a northernly heading. it's speed was between 150-200 mph and altitude approx 1000-2000 ft. object was like a transparent red glass roundish shape with a very bright orange flare in center. as i watched for 2-3 min before landscape obscured my view of it, it struck me as being comical- like an artist's depiction. i didn't look real. shortly after my sighting i called a local news station to see if anyone else reported this-response was negative. i am ex military and not even an astronomer by any means, but i have seen meateors and i know when i'm looking at a satellite, iridium flare or the iss. the object i saw that night had no nav lights and made no noise. i cannot come up with any plausible explanation as to what i saw that night.
content.summary: Transparent red glass like orb, odd roundish shape, w/ bright orange flare like in center approached from east slowly changed to north. guesstimate alt 1-2000ft  speed 150-250 mph. observed 2-3 min.

content.detailedDescription: This is the second fall that we have seen this ufo. it will appear around 9 p.M. in the east very low to ground.It will move up ,down  and side to side and always seems to relocate to the same vicinity.  often small blinker-esque objects will appear to interact with the object. when photographed and zoomed in on 2 large orange orbs appear .They seem to be overlapped in the center.Tonight when photographed the object appears to be zig- zagging wildly around and shooting off a series of 4 smaller balls of blue lights. this has been visible on most clear  nights in our area .I will attach photos soon.Ringing of the ears has occurred when viewing object and it has been also known to drain batteries that are fully charged .
content.summary: Past few weeks what appears to be a very bright star will appear in the sky around 9 p.M.It will ascend.Descend and move across the sky all the while flickering radically .Appears as orange  orbs on camera and tonight blue orbs appear on film. .

content.detailedDescription:
I think we just saw a ufo, about 11:17 pm  ago on the way back from picking my daughter up at work, it flew past overhead, going faster than any plane or bird i've ever seen. it was travel from the west going to the east. it was a large blue-white light, round in shape with crisp edges. (look up at a lit street light and that will give you an idea of the size. now all the dogs on that same path of travel are raising hell too.  no noise was noticed but our windows were up. 

coming up behind us, it appeared over our heads and disappeared into the horizon in about 3 seconds.  it was clearly a good bit over the tops of the trees but not up where jets travel nor even the smaller planes.  clear cool night with plenty of stars visible in the sky and this was huge compared to the largest star in the sky.
content.summary: Large bluish-white circle with clean crisp edges

content.detailedDescription: Above the clouds large pulsating light white not storm every second or less try to film battery not charged on video camera but took  still shots wife witnessed and huming moved from rt. 44 manchester ct. to bradley airport windsor locks ct. didn.T know who to tell but heard of mufon new england strange humming electrical sound. typing fast sorry it was larger than 3-4 footballf fields and above rain clouds. humming went over taylor street manch. ct. there are work crews on 84 highway and state police to fix roads maybe more reports who noknows please post in joural inquirer if more calls or witnesses this is our town news paper in manch, ct. thanks like your shows on t.V. i believe but have not seen structure yet ... some day i think 2012 will be big year for all kinds of things...
content.summary: Southeast direction huming like electrical transformer pulsating above rain clouds larger than several football fields stayed moved  northwest towards bradley airport ct. i had to wake up wife drove in vechile in direction going towards rt. 44 east gone .

content.detailedDescription: A week before sighting, my mother was dying at baltimore shock trauma, i had 10 month old little girl, asleep with me in bed, looked out window saw a star, and heard a voice in my head, can we have your baby, assumed it was ufo, not much phases me and said hell no, telepathically and "star" floated upwards and dissappeared. week later, my dad was visiting mother at hospital, i realized i never took laundry off line, it was around 9 pm, went outside to retrieve laundry and felt like i was being watched, got sared for my child, went back in, 5 min. later my dad bursts thru doorway and said he saw a ufo, car stalled out at end of driveway and he saw several multi-olored lights take off at lightning speed. no-one believed him, idid, til it was in all the papers next day. soon after about 3 to 6 helicopters were in hoy pursuit around our house for several minutes. my sister got scared, i laughed and started playing close encounters of third kind on piano, while she screamed stop it. years later after death of both parents, my child developed what the doctors called an every day one of the mill cysts, but they wouldnt let me see it when they took it out. inside her upperarm you could feel it, it was sharp and pointy. also in 1986 i saw a phantom black cat, soon after that found 2 mutilated dogs at end of drive. our dog died, no rigormortis or bugs, buzzards, nothing. thats it.
content.summary: Father stalled out at endof driveway and saw multi-colored lights take off with lightning speed from object over top of quasa huta

content.detailedDescription: See above
content.summary: Was coming home from class near kissimmee, florida at 2315 and observed a light that blinked, and changed colors from red, to green, to blue. an airplane flew at a lower altitude than said object. small oscillations in movement detected. nothing else.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened back in mid 1996...I was sleeping with my window open and at about 5 am i woke up from the constant whirl of a helicopter over the house...I looked out the window..It was still dark, i thought maybe there had been an accident on the highway which was about a mile away because many times if that happened a news helicopter would hover over the scene. 
it was still dark out and i was shocked when i looked up at the sky and saw this big disc shaped object with different colored lights all around it just hovering and this helicopter (which looked like maybe a green army helicopter) was hovering just watching it. i watched them both just hover there for about 3 min when suddenly, the disc shaped object turned and took off so fast it was gone in an instant! the helicopter slowly turned and then flew away. it was the strangest thing!! but i have no doubt that i saw a ufo being watched by the military!
another time on that property i was standing on the back deck of the house and looked off into the trees and saw a flourescent green rod shaped light flittering around..It was so strange! i told someone about it and they said they are actually some extraterrestrial thing called 'rods' ...Anyhow, there is obviously activity in this area!
content.summary: Saw ufo hovering in bloomfield nj

content.detailedDescription: Same bright white light round and glowing appeared in the sky directly overhead and slowly moved off to the eastern sky.  i watched it for about 40 minutes.  it remained in the sky just slightly to the south and east of my view without moving or being blown about.  light clouds passed beneath it several times and i could see it with binoculars most of the time expect when the cloud cover was too thick.  but it never changed position.  with binoculars it appeared to glow very bright white and had some sort of dark spot in the center.  it also appeared to have some sort of line or tether.  not sure what weather balloons look like or if they are capable of staying stationary in the atmosphere, but this definitely had something attached to it but it seemed under control, not just flapping about the object.  after 40 minutes, the object suddenly began to disintegrate and fall apart, with the larger pieces remaining very bright white and moving off slowly; there was a small area of very small particles, almost dust like, in the spot where the light had been and the larger pieces slowly fell away.  but within a few minutes all of the pieces and the dust like particles suddenly vanished, no trace whatsoever.  if this is some kind of remote meteorlogical experiment, it surely is a very strange one.  and it still doesn't explain the similar sighting from 9/26/2011 when another craft or object of multiple colors was headed for the white light and then ejected two smaller objects before disappearing into the clouds.  what on earth is going on?  is there a logical explanation for this?  there is a very good chance this thing will be out there again tomorrow evening around early dusk...It is not a star or a planet.  it is not celestial in nature.  it is an intelligently controlled object, but controlled by who or what, is the mystery.
content.summary: White object returned 3rd time in a row - different location

content.detailedDescription:
Hanging out with some friends in oro valley last night and saw these weird lights in the sky over the mountains.
i pointed it out to my friends and they both saw exactly what i saw. 
three green lights hovering over the mountains (my phone clock said 9:33pm)
i didn't know who to contact about it but i saw this website and figured i'd give my testimony.
i witnessed three bright green glowing orbs over the mountains north of the tucson area.
i've never really been one to belive in ufos before, but i saw this thing shoot into the air after fifteen minutes... and no man-made craft does that.
whatever it was, it was pretty damn big.
i don't want to sound like some insane person right now.
but... i was with a group of people and they all saw it, too.
they all shrugged it off but i know that stars and man made aircrafts don't look like that.
did anybody else see them?
content.summary: Tucson 9/27/2011 three glowing green orbs in triangle pattern hover above mountain, shoot into sky after 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I went on my porch to smoke a cigerette and to see the rain storm. i looked up cause i saw a flash of lightening. the noticed a really bright white light and it seemed to have blinking lights like a aircraft would but it didnt make no noise or any movement. it hovered during the durattion of my first cigerette and while i was smoking it i saw the blinking lights change from green, red, blue, and yellow. then i lit another cigerette cause it got me intriqued. i was watching it then i saw a bright red light appeared from the center and it lasted for maybe 2 to 3 seconds and then dimmed to and the white light resumed. now during this time i had my wife come out to confirm that i wasnt seeing things and she saw the light as well. so my wife went into the apartment and then noticed the light move northward then stopped. now i had went out at 8pm eastern standard time and i lost sight of it 845pm. i lost sight of the object cause it went over some trees that are nearby my apartment.
content.summary: A bright white light, multicolor light changes from red, green, blue, and it dimmed on and off..It was stationary at one time then started to slowly drift away north over the trees

content.detailedDescription: Comment on your sighting on 9/27/11 - moving objects in sky for 7 nights. i have been a ufo researcher for 52 years and have studied the sky intensely as an amateur astronomer. i have located about 5 to 6 false stars - these eject orbs, the orbs go on a mission, then return to the larger craft. the larger craft move around quickly to gather the orbs upon returning. these larger objects are most likely motherships - ejecting orbs in the west, south, & east of my location 25 miles outside phila. they do stop moving when an aircraft nears, although these craft must be much higher in the atmosphere. i can see them with the naked eye due to practice. their quick movements to assist in the capture of orbs is easily noticeable with a little practice. i refer to them as false stars since they mimic stars to avoid detection. hope this helps.
content.summary: Comment about report submitted 9/28/2011 from mo.,us about multiple starlike objects moving eratically.

content.detailedDescription: About 1:15 a.M. i was on my porch having a cigarette, and was looking up at the stars. as i was looking up, i saw a triangle with three red lights on the corners appear out of nowhere moving from south to north, as though it was invisible and appeared and then disappeared. i thought i was seeing things as i watched it move across the sky for about 30 secs and then it disappeared. it had no sound, i knew it was not a plane or helicopter. it was moving fast, but at the same time seemed like it was skipping across the sky. due to the craft's lights gave the appearance of it skipping but i knew it was moving on a straight path.
content.summary: Triangle craft

content.detailedDescription:
i took photographs of contrail left by what seems to be a pulse wave detonation engine.  the aircraft emitting the contrail was almost to the western horizon by the time i noticed the contrail almost overhead.  i only saw a glint of the aircraft in the very bright sunlight,(my angle of view was almost directly into the sun).  it appeared to be traveling at a very high rate of speed.  it travelled in a straight line from the southeastern horizon to the western horizon.  i heard no sound at the time of the sighting, nor after. 
    this could be consistant with other reports of top-secret experimental,(or operational?)military aircraft such as the "aurora", or the "x-33".

brian klein
lead, sd
content.summary: Contrail of possible pulse wave detonation engine (pde) ie.

content.detailedDescription: Back in the fall of '09, my wife and i went out to  the back roads outside of sun prairie, wi (northern edge of town). we often did this to go star gazing and get away from some of the light pollution from madison. the time was around 9 pm and it was a clear night, with not a cloud in sight. it was fall, like i said, so it was cooler and we needed to wear jackets. we stopped on the shoulder of a road that ran north and south along the edge of a corn field (i think n or bird street). it was a great night because we could see so much - galaxy, satellites, planes, etc. we were looking at the sky and i turned to look south south/east and noticed something weird in the sky, about 60 degrees above the horizon. it was a bright white orb, that appeared star-like, but was much too large to be a star (roughly between a star and aspirin in size). since we live close to the truax madison airport and that area is the approach path for many planes, i first thought it was a plane or jet exhaust. what was odd about it, was that number one, it made no sound! it also had no blinking lights of any type, and seemed to give off a bright-white to almost blue-white unwavering glow that was just on the brink of twinkling like a star. it was circular in shape to my eyes, but so are most stars, so i couldn't get any definite shape of it. it is hard to guess the distance away and size of it since i could only see it as a larger than normal star like glow. however, that said, this had to be between 1-5 miles away and roughly 500 ft in the sky, based on how planes on approach look (size in the sky). when i spotted it, it appeared motionless for an instant, and then i noticed it was moving in a very slow, deliberate, straight path from right to left (maybe a distance of 1 to 2 actual miles?). it was moving for maybe a minute and eventually faded out of sight. again, no sound was heard during this whole event. during i didn't take my eyes off of it and didn't blink because i didn't want to lose it. i asked my wife, "what the hell is that?". when she looked she didn't know and watched it with me. she disregarded it as most likely a plane, but i didn't think so since i have seen many types of aircraft come in for landings and this was not typical. i thought for sure that i had seen something unidentified, but couldn't be positive, so i didn't bother reporting it. i decided to now just for integrity. felt intrigued afterward, and now that i think of that night, i don't remember any other aircraft in the sky during the event. the whole sighting was strange. also wanted to post because i have seen several other reports of near identical description from other parts of the country.
content.summary: Looking s/se just outside of sun prairie wi back in fall of '09 in evening; saw bright white orb travel from right to left making no sound.

content.detailedDescription: This is a photo my son sent me many years ago and forgot about it till now its pretty amazing if it is real it is quite a shot i am sure you will agry
content.summary: Have photo of craft over tree 1967 photo i found in draw

content.detailedDescription:
I am a local photographer here in boyd county ky. on september 11, 2011 i was taking individual football pictures of some boys at boyd county high school. i was shooting back towards the east. i did not notice anything in the picture while i was taking them. however after i got home and was reviewing the shots, i saw a small light in the distance in one of the pictures. i zoomed the picture in to see what it was, and it appears to be an inverted stealth bomber. it was dark on top and lighter on the bottom. the next day our newspaper ran an article about ufo sightings over the weekend in boyd co. i had not said a word to anyone about this. i was also informed that about 50 or 60 people in seattle washington saw the same object i photographed 3 hours after i took the pictures.

picture 1 is full length shot and you can see a small light in the distance over his shoulder.

picture 2 is zoomed in and can be zoomed in to 400% for viewing.
content.summary: Captured in a photoshoot in boyd co ky

content.detailedDescription:
As given by phone to asd today.  no phone number or -email was provided and there was no caller id (it said private): 

the witness stated that she just had to tell someone what she saw but didn't want any further contact. 

"i am a government employee working in downtown kansas city, missouri and when i went to lunch yesterday with two friends i noticed something hovering in the sky above us.  it was almost transparent, and had a glow to  it.  it was a silver craft with a whitish glow around it.  there were no lights that i could see but it looked like it was lit up somehow. i stopped and looked at it, and asked my friends if they saw it, too, but they didn't.  then one said, "yea, there is something there, but i can't see what it is."  i don't know what that meant. they just wanted to go on to lunch, but i was shocked that i could see this silver disc-shaped ufo but neither one of them could see it even though we were looking in the same location. i figured later on that maybe they just couldn't deal with the strangeness of the situation.  i mean, a ufo in the middle of the day in a downtown area?  i looked around at other people, but they seemed oblivious to it. i've never seen anything like this and it really has me shaken.  i can't give my personal information out because i have a sensitive job."
content.summary: Ufo hovering over buildings in downtown kansas city

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the back steps smoking a cigeret and i always like to watch the birds or aircraft when i noticed an aircraft shaped object to the north it appeard strange because i couldnt see any wings ,tail or contrail useing my binocs i could see the object was long cylindricaland white with no windows it moved in an east to west path slowly for about 1 an half mins then it appeared to shrink into aball but it had changed direction to a northand south path for a min then it looked like it elongated but it had only changed direction again bac to the east west course it continued in that direction for about another min then it just disappeard no sign of it with or without the binocs
content.summary: Clear day spotted craft but didnt see anywing or tail used binocs got good look

content.detailedDescription: It was sometime within the 2nd week of january,school had just started up agian. i had a early class at 7, it was around a 30 min drive so i was drving a little after 6 am i just passed southmoore high school on sante fe at the intersection of sante fe and sw 34th street i could see in the distnace to the south a bright light, i assumed was a plane landing because it was so bright and so low but as i got to w indian hills road i realized,i was still pretty sleepy, that there is no airport near by, the closest is will rogers i think in the opposite direction, and it hadnt moved in the 10 minutes i was watching it but it kinda look like it was like glowing or pulsing but not moving, i started driving toward it on indian hills road and i soon realized how low it was, but i couldnt really tell where it was i crossed a bridge over i-35 and since it still hadent moved i thought it was a helicopter so i was hoping i could see it better since it kept getting bigger as i got closer i got to the intersection of 24th street and realized its right along the road, i turned off my music and listend for helicopter sounds, all i heard was the engine of my truck, i got closer and soon realized this wasnt normal the one object now appered as 3 lights i think they were conected cuz the outside lights appered to have a curve to them like as if curving to the surface of th eobject i really dont know all i could see was three lights forming a line that i kept getting closer to i was so close i still didnt know what i was looking at but i was still calm for somereason, in hindsight i dont know i didnt freak out but i went down a hill then as soon as the hill curved back up i was directly underneath it i stoped pretty close to right underneath it i looked up my windshield and it was sort of the shape of a diamond but there were 4 outer lights and on each extior side of light the light like curved or had a boomerrang light attached to the light kind of like a bell but where the bell widen was just a thin curve attached to a ball of light, there was a light in the middle that was just round, i stared up at it for what felt like forever, it was right above the powerlines it really looked as if it was hoovering on them almost touching them, i heard no soundeds i just stared aimlessly up at this light not scared but just captivated and curious it felt like i had been there an hour but i looked at the clock and it had only been 10 mins so i decided that i should contniue on my way to school i drove past it it was still there but i turned onto 12th street and look behind me and it was no longer there it was completly gone i got extremely cold, it was very cold outside and my truck heater leaves alot to be desired and i realized the entire time i was underneath i wasnt cold at all , when i got to school i touched the roof of my truck and it was alot warmer then the hood of my truck. none of this bothered me unitl the next morning when i was extremly nervous to go down that road again but i did have done almost everyday and havent seen it again since
content.summary: Driving to an early class i saw a bright object in the distance that never moved

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone today: 

i am 55 years old and have been a sky watcher my entire life. my dad used to take me out to show me the stars and constellations, and i kept up the tradition with my own son.  at night we like to go out and lay on the roof to watch the stars and the milky way.  since we live in a rural area we can see the stars very well.  the past seven nights i've noticed multiple star-like objects that move around in zigzag patterns, circles, and back and forth erratically.  this is something entirely new and something i've never seen before. the objects move very fast.  some remain still for a long time, then make sudden movements.  

the first night i noticed a large bright object in the dark center of the milky way that shouldn't have been there.  i watched it for a while trying to figure out what it was, when to my surprise it started moving. i noticed that when planes are in the area, it stops moving, but after they planes are gone it moves again.  this particular object seems to be returning nightly.  however, there are others.  some nights there are as few as four, and other nights as many as a dozen, with numbers increasing nightly.  i've never seen a plane move as fast as these objects do.  

the most active places to look are in the west and south sky, and they are active from dark until dawn.  my neighbors and son have also noticed this phenomena. i can see the objects with the naked eye or with binoculars, but have been unsuccessful using the telescope.  i want to find out if anyone else is seeing the same thing.
content.summary: Mulitple starlike objects moving erratically around the sky for 7 nights

Same white light as on 9-26-11 but in a new location - stayed about ten minutes, then disappeared.  my bet is that it will be back same time this evening somewhere over the denver metro area - so if anyone has an idea of what this is exactly - please info

content.detailedDescription: While taking a break form throwing the news paper. at 5:40 am, wednesday september 28, 2011 i looked up at my favorite constellation orion and i wittnessed 2 star like objects flying south at a incredible speed. the objects were also flying in-formation, side by side. 3 seconds is all it took the the objects to move from the 12:00 position ( over head ) to the 2:00 position and then went out of sight past the horizon. i estimate there speed at somewere between 2000 - 3000 mph. no sonic boom was heard so i figure the object had to be in the outer atmosphere, flying at even greater speeds.
content.summary: 2 star like objects flying in formation at high velocity

content.detailedDescription: 8:30  pm on sept.27 2011 i was outside smoking when i seen this icredibly bright orange red object coming over my neighbors house, then suddenly another appeared following the first. they were identicle in appearance.Moving very slowly almost hovering. then started moving east,after about 30 seconds i ran into the house to grab my camera. knowing that the batteries were dead i yelled at my wife to hurry outside. she followed me and i pointed but she had already seen them. the lead one started ascending and the light got dimmer,almost white. after about another 30 seconds they both were disappearing and then they vanished heading east. i looked at the clock to get the correct time,it was 8:32.
content.summary: Amazing colored lights arose from the western sky,large slow moving objects with no noise,slowly ascended as they went east changed color, then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
While im stayed on my garden i was observed a one brillant point on the sky, im just observed the object for a few minutes, when i saw the movement of the object i call to my wife for look the brilliant point too. in these moment another brilliant point appears near the first one...My wife and me was very exited, we call to own children for look the strange lights. it was very strange! on the afternoon, with sun light, found two lights, same to the stars intensity with fast movement over us! was a really strange succes...

we moves around the garden for looked the movements, separate and meet again, while after 5 minutes of movements the two lights disappears to the sky...

i,m very sure thats not any plane or any machine that we knows in that present...

any military obje ts, planes? we don,t know.
content.summary: Two lights over the sky, moves fast

content.detailedDescription: My friend told me that he'd been seeing ufos and taking their pictures.  he emailed me some pictures and i went over to see if i'd see one. i was looking south from vancouver, wa when i observed a white light that looked like a star, but it was below the atmosphere. it hovered there for a couple minutes and then began changing colors.  it did this for about 2 or 3 more minutes, then it took off horizontally to the east at a high rate of speed.
content.summary: I saw a bright light that looked like a star.  it was stationary for a couple minutes.  it started changing colors from orange to red to yellow
